hero.title: Wedding Photography & Cinematic Films in Bengaluru
hero.subtitle: From sacred South Indian rituals to vibrant North Indian celebrations, from elegant Christian weddings to intimate court marriages — we capture love in its purest form. Every frame is crafted with emotion, honesty, and timeless elegance.

about.title: About Pavithra Stories
about.text:
At Pavithra Stories, we believe photography is more than images — it is memory, emotion, and legacy. Every wedding is unique, every couple has a story, and every moment deserves to be preserved with authenticity.

Our approach is simple yet powerful: observe quietly, feel deeply, and capture truthfully. From the nervous smiles before the ceremony to the laughter that follows, we document moments as they naturally unfold.

With a deep respect for traditions, cultures, and emotions, we blend creativity with storytelling to create photographs and films that feel real — today, tomorrow, and forever.
